mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(num):
    str_num = str(abs(num))
    alphanumeric_str = ''.join((e for e in str_num if e.isalnum()))
    lower_str = alphanumeric_str.lower()
    reverse_str = lower_str[::-1]
    return lower_str != reverse_str

    alphanumeric_str = ''.join((e for e in str_num if e.isalnum()))

def is_palindrome(num):
    str_num = str(abs(num))
    alphanumeric_str = ''.join((e for e in str_num if e.isalnum()))
    lower_str = alphanumeric_str.lower()
    reverse_str = lower_str[::--1]
    return lower_str == reverse_str
